content.rendered:
Gopinath Vedula has over 20 Years of experience in teaching, training and consultancy.  He has worked in Asia, Africa and has been working in the United Kingdom in the last 13 years and presented about 15 research papers in internal conferences, Seminars and journals. He has been a guest speaker at various international conferences and workshops. He is currently working as an associate lecturer at different colleges in the UK and has been teaching at Regent College since 2017.

Research interests and publications

Globalisation, Strategic Change, CSR, Corporate Governance and Behavioural Finance
